name: 1inch-cross-chain
description: Cross-chain atomic swap system with AI-enhanced relayer network

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd relayer-services && npm install && cd ../ui && npm install && cd ../bitcoin-scripts && npm install && cd ../contracts/ethereum && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:relayers && npm run build:ui
scripts.test:all: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:relayers && npm run test:bitcoin

author: 1inch Cross-Chain Team
